label: ABC_oP24_61_c_c_c-001
title: COCl Structure
comments: (Groth, 1962) are not confident about the atomic positions, saying that ``The computed values for the oxalyl chloride molecule \dots [are probably] less reliable than those listed for the bromide molecule [COBr].'' In fact, we have not been able to reconcile their crystal structure for COBr with the distances between the atoms, so we have left that structure out of the database at this time.
